title: Taylor Swift adds more dates to 'Eras' tour, including a third show in the L.A. area
dc:creator: Nardine Saad
description: Taylor Swift has added eight more shows to her Eras stadium tour, including a third L.A.-area show at SoFi Stadium in August to close out U.S. leg.
content:encoded: Taylor Swift has added eight more shows to her Eras stadium tour, including a third L.A.-area show at SoFi Stadium in August to close out U.S. leg.

media:content.media:description: Taylor Swift arrives at the MTV Video Music Awards at the Prudential Center on Sunday, Aug. 28, 2022, in Newark, N.J.
